resources.string: Disclaimer: This screen will only be dark when Dark Mode is forced in the OS settings in Android Q and above.
Press the Courses button to set up your schedule

"This application will help you get to class on time for MEI or MIEI Perfis.
 More importantly, though, it will help me pass my IATA course and I'm sure that's an important goal for you, dear user :)


It will do this by collecting anonymous data (totally anonymous!) on where you are at class times, so as to determine the variation between in-presence and online attendance."
